name: Healing Fate
description:
In Healing Fate you play as the support. Help your soldiers fight off a swarm of enemies by healing and buffing.

Key Features:

  • 9 challenging levels
  • High amount of strategy
  • 3 different support heroes to experiment with.

This game was created as an entry to the UNIDOS Game Jam 2022 by solo developer Marco F. Wejse.

Happy Hispanic Heritage month!
